articles.title: Sam Altman addresses ‘bumpy’ GPT-5 rollout, bringing 4o back, and the ‘chart crime’

articles.title: RIP, Microsoft Lens, a simple little app that’s getting replaced by AI
articles.description: Microsoft is killing Lens, a handy mobile scanning app with over 90 million downloads.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Former Googlers’ AI startup OpenArt now creates ‘brain rot’ videos in just one click
articles.description: OpenArt launched a new feature to help creators make AI-generated brain rot videos.

articles.title: NASA and Google are building an AI medical assistant to keep Mars-bound astronauts healthy

articles.title: Google tests revamped Google Finance with AI upgrades, live news feed
